title: Account being sold and stolen back
body: What do we do if we know there is a account that is being sold and being stolen back every few months? I know of one right now.

replies.body: Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our account and fraud teams will take a look.  Can't share any specifics, but that's not cool!
